dcterms:creator: Wei Jiang
Kwang Moo Yi
Golnoosh Samei
Oncel Tuzel
Anurag Ranjan
dcterms:description: The NeuMan Dataset consists of six videos, each lasting between 10 to 20 seconds, featuring a single individual captured using a mobile phone. The camera pans through the scenes, facilitating multi-view reconstruction.
dcterms:title: NeuMan Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sida Peng
Yuanqing Zhang
Yinghao Xu
Qianqian Wang
Qing Shuai
Hujun Bao
Xiaowei Zhou
dcterms:description: The ZJU-MoCap Dataset consists of videos of a human captured in a lab using a multi-view capture setup. It includes diverse motions from six subjects, with camera matrices, body pose, and segmentation provided for evaluation.
dcterms:title: ZJU-MoCap Dataset
